podcast_details.podcast_title: Bill O’Reilly’s No Spin News and Analysis
podcast_details.episode_transcript: Save on travel expenses this summer by investing in a delightful garden from FastGrowingTrees.com. I ordered a dwarf tree for my backyard. It's great. With FastGrowingTrees' 30-day Alive and Thrive Guarantee, you know everything will look perfect. So please join 2 million happy FastGrowingTrees customers. Go to FastGrowingTrees.com slash bill right now and you'll get 15% off your entire order. That's 15% off at FastGrowingTrees.com slash bill. Bill O'Reilly here and I'm warming up. Stand by for the O'Reilly Update Morning Edition. But first. On this Monday, fear the walking Trump. He could win re-election as the country descends into chaos. You can't deny it. The border, crime, the economy, and overseas threats all are reaching critical mass. And President Biden, the Democratic Party, and the leftist media have no solutions whatsoever. None. So as things get worse in 2023, which they will, an Avenger like Donald Trump takes on more momentum. His message is very simple. The country's going to hell and I, Donald Trump, can stop that. I can correct the wrongs. Because during my four years in office, with the exception of COVID, which nobody could stop, Trump governed pretty effectively. The economy was good. Wages were up. People were working. Overseas was fairly calm. There was no border craziness because of the remain in Mexico policy. And crime in the streets while on the rise was nothing like it is now. So you may not like him and millions of Americans do not, but Donald Trump is a viable presidential candidate in 2024. Back in a moment. Surprises can be great unless they break your budget, which is what can happen when unexpected home appliances or systems break down. Suddenly your budget is stressed to the max because of a broken dishwasher or a leaking toilet or a dryer that just won't dry. Luckily with American Home Shield, you can protect what you don't expect. Just choose a home service plan that's right for you. And when a covered item in your home breaks, just contact American Home Shield. Their trusted and qualified pros will fix it or replace it based on the coverage limits in your agreement. It's that easy to keep budget breaking surprises under control and keep your mind stress free. And right now my audience can take $50 off. So please go to ahs.com slash bill to save 50 bucks. That's ahs.com slash bill for $50 off any plan. American Home Shield, protect what you don't expect. The planned contract for coverage details including fees, limitations and exclusions. That is the Morning O'Reilly Update. More analysis later on.

message.content: In this podcast, the host promotes FastGrowingTrees.com as a way to save on travel expenses by investing in a garden. The website offers a variety of plants, shrubs, and trees that are easy to grow for different climates. The host shares their own positive experience with ordering a dwarf tree for their backyard from FastGrowingTrees.com. The website offers a 30-day Alive and Thrive Guarantee, ensuring that the plants will arrive in perfect condition. The host encourages listeners to visit FastGrowingTrees.com/bill for a 15% discount on their entire order. After the advertisement, the podcast shifts to Bill O'Reilly discussing his views on the potential re-election of Donald Trump. O'Reilly suggests that with the current state of the country, Trump could gain momentum and present himself as a viable presidential candidate in 2024. O'Reilly highlights the issues of the border, crime, economy, and overseas threats, claiming that the Democratic Party and the media have no solutions. O'Reilly also praises Trump's previous governance, mentioning the positive economy, wages, and relative calm overseas during his time in office. The podcast concludes with an advertisement for American Home Shield, offering home service plans and $50 off for listeners.

podcast_guest: Joanna Charrington is a music industry executive, widely regarded as one of the most influential and successful female A&R executives in British Music history.  She is currently Co-President of EMI Records and President of Capitol Records in the UK. Her industry career began at London Records in 1992 as a marketing assistant before moving to Virgin Records in the International Department, then BMG working for the President Jeremy Marsh."

message.content:
In this podcast, the host mentions a website called FastGrowingTrees.com that offers a wide variety of plants, shrubs, and trees for different climates. The website allows users to order plants online, which are delivered in just a few days. The host mentions their personal experience of ordering a dwarf tree from the website and expresses satisfaction with the product. The website also offers a 30-day Alive and Thrive Guarantee. Listeners are encouraged to visit FastGrowingTrees.com/bill to get a 15% discount on their entire order. 

The podcast then transitions to Bill O'Reilly, who discusses the possibility of Donald Trump winning re-election in 2024. O'Reilly suggests that as the country faces issues such as the border, crime, the economy, and overseas threats, Trump's message of being able to fix these problems may gain momentum. O'Reilly highlights some positive aspects of Trump's previous presidency, such as a good economy, increased wages, and calm overseas situations. He concludes by acknowledging that while many Americans may not like Trump, he remains a viable presidential candidate. 

The podcast ends with a brief endorsement for American Home Shield, a company that provides home warranty plans. Listeners are told that they can save $50 off any plan by visiting ahs.com/bill.
